metadata.title: CVE-2024-28103 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Action Pack is a framework for handling and responding to web requests.Since 6.1.0, the application configurable Permissions-Policy is only servedon responses with an HTML related Content-Type. This vulnerability is fixedin  6.1.7.8, 7.0.8.2, and 7.1.3.3.

criterions.comment: rails package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
